item.description:
Tasca offers special dinners ($5 Bottles Wine/Sangria ) Mon. - Thurs. & the food is great.

SAMPLE MENU

Appetizers
Butternut Squash soup w/ crème fraîche and toasted walnuts (vegetarian)
Marinated grilled lamb skewer
Spanish morcilla (black sausage) & savory apple chutney
Yellow split pea soup w/smoked ham & roasted vegetables
Baby garden greens in chipotle orange vinaigrette w/ beets, toasted pumpkin seeds & goat cheese croutons

Entrees
Pan sautéed veal sweetbreads w/ lentils, bacon, & parsnip mashed potato
Roasted pork tenderloin stuffed w/ spinach and cheese au jus w/ grilled zucchini & garlic mashed potatoes
Grilled beef top filet steak au jus w/creamed spinach and garlic mashed potato
Roast leg of duckling w/ savory pork sausage over braised red cabbage & apples in a blackberry sauce
Foraged mushroom stroganoff over fettucine w/ shaved parmesan cheese
Grilled Swordfish over linguine in a tomato sauce w/ capers and black olives

PLUS Dessert!

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: TASCA (Brighton) Appetite Stimulus $16 Three Course Spanish Menu
